page.title: 09Entertainment in Ballantrae.
page.content: Musical concerts and sketches by local drama groups are very popular. Young people enjoy youth club, badminton,football training and discos. Whist drives organised by various clubs are well supported. School sports arouse great interest. An annual flower show is held including well patronised children's classes. Church annual Fun on the Foreland and Sale of Work are popular summer events. Local weddings arouse much interest. 3 hotels and Masonic Lodge provide venues for socialising. Coffee mornings are enjoyed and are successful fund-raising events.A well supported annual ball takes place. 2 Christmas parties and 2 summer outings are arranged for senior citizens.The school pupils elect a senior pupil as village Gala Queen each year.
